  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>SDT</catalog>
            <entry>0a02860b-9e43-4830-bb86-46b13ded4e81#1#2</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="hu">Amerikai bölény</string>
            <string language="en">American bison</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Amerikanischer Bison</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Bison américain</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Bisonte americano</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Bisonte americano</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αμερικανικός βίσωνας</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Bisonte americano</string>
          </title>
          <language>hu</language>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">Bölények az észak-amerikai prérin</string>
            <string language="en">Bisons on the North American prairies</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu">füves puszta,  patások,  párosujjú patások,  bölény,  </string>
            <string language="en">grass-covered steppe, ungulates, even-toed ungulates, bison</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Bisone auf dem nordamerikanischen Grasland</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Bisons sur les prairies américaines 
du nord</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Bisontes nas pradarias norte-americanas</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Bisonti sui prairies nordamericani</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Βίσωνες στα βορειοαμερικανικά λιβάδια</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Bisontes en las praderas norteamericanas</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Gras-bedeckte Steppe, ungulates, 
gleichmäßig-even-toed ungulates, Bison</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">la steppe herbe-couverte, ungulates, égal-a botté des
ungulates avec la pointe du pied, bison</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">o steppe grama-coberto, ungulates, uniforme-even-toed 
ungulates, bisonte</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">la steppa erba-coperta, ungulates, uniforme-ha piantato 
i ungulates di traverso, bisonte</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">η χλόη-καλυμμένη στέπα, ungulates, ομαλός- ungulates, 
βίσωνας</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">la estepa hierba-cubierta, ungulates, uniforme-toco' con
la punta del pie los ungulates, bisonte</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>

            <string language="en">The content may be used for the sole purpose of illustration for teaching or scientific research and only for a strictly non-commercial purpose.</string>
